summary: PAINT IS PEELING OFF OF TOP OF 99 WINDSTAR.  PRIMER IS STILL INTACT BUT THE PAINT WILL PEEL OFF IN BIG "HUNKS" AND NOW THERE IS A AREA OF APPROX 12"X4" THAT IS JUST PRIMER.  THE RAIN GUTTER PAINT IS CRACKED AND WILL PEEL OFF SOON.  FORD HOTLINE REFERS TO DEALER, DEALER SAYS IT IS OUT OF WARRANTY.  (OF COURSE IT HAPPENS RIGHT OUT OF WARRANTY.)
